page.title: 04One Week in Gringley (Cont.)
page.content:
{Wed.12.June}St.Peter's School.Sports Day committee meeting to arrange Annual Sports Day to be held on Sat. 6.July at Playing Fields.
{Thurs.13.June}St.Peter's School combined with Sturton-le-Steeple Primary School for visit to Belton House(Stately Home) 9:30-3:30pm. Coffee Morning 10:30am. Committee Meeting 8:00pm to discuss management of Village Hall.
{Fri.14.June}St.Peter's School.Primary School visit to Misterton School to see two plays:"The Snow Queen" & "The Evacuees".Youth Club visit to Clumber Park.Coffee Evening to raise money for Ordsall Hall School held at Mr&Mrs G. Jackson's home ("Sunnyside", High St.) 6:30pm.
